issue.title: [C++] Migrate existing usage of ThreadIndexer to ThreadLocalState and get rid of ThreadIndexer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16179](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16179). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ARROW-16178 introduces a better way of doing thread indexing.  Once ARROW-15732 is resolved then we can get rid of the old way and migrate to the new approach.
